review: Always has the same movies on the Prime video list, which is very short so unless you know the name of the movie, you're basically s.o.l. not to mention as a prime member, you too have to pay extra for shows and cartoons like the Simpsons, family guy, movies that are old even. Where's the thousands of movies that I paid for??? Not worth the money. Netflix is better with more movies and shows that you don't have to pay extra for after paying for your subscription.

review: Fire stick gets too hot and locks up A LOT (after 1-2 hours of Netflix). Love the interface over my Netgear and Chromecast, but I hate that I have to reboot it all the time. I went back to the Netgear and unplugged the Fire stick.
